original_text: When Noah awoke from his wine and knew what his youngest son had done to him,
korean_text: 노아가 술이 깨어 그의 작은 아들이 자기에게 행한 일을 알고

sentences.original_text: When Noah awoke from his wine
and knew what his youngest son had done to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 막내 아들이 자기에게 무슨 짓을 했는지 알았습니다
